alert.note: Alert for Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 9:34PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Stephenson County through 1000 PM CDT... At 934 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dakota, or near Freeport, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Davis around 940 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Illinois.
